Code Analysis Tool

Jun 2025 - Aug 2025

An AI-powered tool that helps developers analyze and understand complex codebases more effectively. Features multi-LLM support (OpenAI, Ollama, Perplexity) with embeddings powered by OpenSearch.

Mound Data Structure Implementation

Software Development

Designed and implemented a C program incorporating the Mound Data Structure based on Lehigh University research. Achieved efficient O(log(log(N))) insertion and O(log(N)) minimum extraction complexities using randomization techniques.
